entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. POP 30%

Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
